questions.text: Is there a standardized ML pipeline for model training and deployment?

info.what: A standardized ML pipeline ensures consistent model training and deployment processes.
info.why: Standardization reduces errors, improves reproducibility, and enables scaling.
info.example: Using tools like MLflow or Kubeflow to manage the entire ML lifecycle.

questions.text: Are data requirements clearly defined and documented?

info.what: Data requirements refer to determining the specific data needed for training, validating, and testing machine learning models.
info.why: Clear data requirements ensure quality, format consistency, and compliance with privacy regulations.
info.example: Documenting required data sources, formats, storage needs, and governance considerations.

questions.text: Is there a governance verification and risk assessment process?

info.what: Evaluating and ensuring that the governance framework is effectively designed.
info.why: Proper governance ensures compliance with regulations and manages risks effectively.
info.example: Implementing policies for data privacy, model deployment, version control, and security.
